column8: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
At the start of your turn, place a development on a valid system you control.
At the start of your turn, gain 2 credits.
When this system is first developed, build a Defense Stations.
When this system is first developed, draw two cards.
When this system is first developed, place another development on it.
Only small ships and Fighters can enter this system.
Ships in this system cannot be targeted by Commands.
Ships that enter this system cannot attack until next turn.
You may build ships during any phase of your turn.
Discard a card: Target ship can jump to any system.
